mapper.sql: POSITION_ID, POSITION_NAME, POSITION_CODE, P_POSITION_ID, REGION_NBR, SORT_NUM, NOTES, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT C.POSITION_ID id ,C.POSITION_NAME name,C.P_POSITION_ID pid, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(B.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF A, SYS_ROLE B WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.ROLE_CODE = B.ROLE_CODE AND A.POSITION_CODE=C.POSITION_CODE) EXTFIELD1 FROM SYS_POSITION C WHERE C.STATUS_CD = '1000' and C.P_POSITION_ID = #{positionId}

SELECT C.POSITION_ID id ,C.POSITION_NAME name,C.P_POSITION_ID pid, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(B.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF A, SYS_ROLE B WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.ROLE_CODE = B.ROLE_CODE AND A.POSITION_CODE=C.POSITION_CODE) EXTFIELD1 FROM SYS_POSITION C WHERE C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.P_POSITION_ID is null

SELECT C.POSITION_ID ID, C.POSITION_NAME NAME, C.P_POSITION_ID PID, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(B.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF A, SYS_ROLE B WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.ROLE_CODE = B.ROLE_CODE AND A.POSITION_CODE=C.POSITION_CODE) EXTFIELD1, (SELECT DECODE(COUNT(1),0,0,1) FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD='1000' AND A.P_POSITION_ID=C.POSITION_ID ) isParent FROM SYS_POSITION C WHERE C.STATUS_CD = '1000'

choose.when:
SELECT A.POSITION_ID positionId, A.P_POSITION_ID pPositionId, A.POSITION_NAME positionName, A.REGION_NBR regionNbr, (SELECT TCR.REGION_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_REGION TCR WHERE TCR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND TCR.REGION_NBR=A.REGION_NBR) REGIONNAME, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(SR.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF SPRR, SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SPRR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.ROLE_CODE = SPRR.ROLE_CODE AND SPRR.POSITION_CODE = A.POSITION_CODE) ROLENAMES, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF SDPR WHERE SDPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SDPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGPOSITIONNUM, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_USER_POSITION_REF SUPR WHERE SUPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SUPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGUSERNUM FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.P_POSITION_ID = #{vo.positionId}
AND A.POSITION_NAME like '%'||#{vo.search}||'%'
choose.otherwise:
SELECT * from ( SELECT A.POSITION_ID positionId, A.P_POSITION_ID pPositionId, A.POSITION_NAME positionName, A.REGION_NBR regionNbr, (SELECT TCR.REGION_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_REGION TCR WHERE TCR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND TCR.REGION_NBR=A.REGION_NBR) REGIONNAME, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(SR.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF SPRR, SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SPRR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.ROLE_CODE = SPRR.ROLE_CODE AND SPRR.POSITION_CODE = A.POSITION_CODE) ROLENAMES, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF SDPR WHERE SDPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SDPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGPOSITIONNUM, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_USER_POSITION_REF SUPR WHERE SUPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SUPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGUSERNUM FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' START WITH A.POSITION_ID = #{vo.positionId} CONNECT BY PRIOR A.POSITION_ID = A.P_POSITION_ID ) where 1=1
AND positionName like '%'||#{vo.search}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT WM_CONCAT(SR.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF SPRR, SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SPRR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.ROLE_CODE = SPRR.ROLE_CODE AND SPRR.POSITION_CODE = A.POSITION_CODE) ROLENAMES FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.P_POSITION_ID = #{positionId}

SELECT A.POSITION_ID positionId,A.POSITION_NAME positionName,A.POSITION_CODE positionCode,A.P_POSITION_ID pPositionId,A.REGION_NBR regionNbr,A.SORT_NUM sortNum,A.NOTES notes, (select B.POSITION_NAME from SYS_POSITION B where B.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND B.POSITION_ID = A.P_POSITION_ID) pPositionName FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.POSITION_ID = #{positionId}

SELECT B.POSITION_ID positionId,B.POSITION_NAME positionName,B.POSITION_CODE positionCode,B.P_POSITION_ID pPositionId FROM SYS_POSITION B, SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND B.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND A.POSITION_CODE = B.POSITION_CODE AND A.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode}

select b.role_id roleId, b.role_name roleName, b.role_code roleCode, b.parent_role_code parentRoleCode, b.region_nbr regionNbr from SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF a, SYS_ROLE b where a.status_cd = 1000 and b.status_cd = 1000 and a.role_code = b.role_code and a.position_code = #{positionCode}
select count(1) from SYS_USER_POSITION_REF a where a.status_cd='1000' and a.position_code=#{positionCode}
select count(1) from SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF a where a.status_cd='1000' and a.position_code=#{positionCode}
select count(1) from SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF a where a.status_cd='1000' and a.position_code=#{positionCode}
